key.name: pos-x
key.defaultt: 360 Horizontal position The saved horizontal position of our window

key.name: pos-y
key.defaultt: 360 Vertical position The saved vertical position of our window

key.name: window-width
key.defaultt: 600 Windows width The saved width of our window

key.name: window-height
key.defaultt: 400 Window height The saved height of our window
